mapper.select: select no, name, search_per, now_p from stock

insert.foreach: insert into stock( no, name, search_per, now_p, ntob, updown, howmany, start_p, high_p, low_p, per, roe ) values( seq_stock_no.nextval, #{menu.name},#{menu.search_per}, #{menu.now_p}, #{menu.ntob}, #{menu.updown}, #{menu.howmany}, #{menu.start_p}, #{menu.high_p}, #{menu.low_p}, #{menu.per}, #{menu.roe})
